src:
無人知曉的職業婦女派對魂——聖誕派對倒數4小時，緊急作戰計劃
06 Nov 2019, 06:53 by TNL Marketing


我們想讓你知道的是職業婦女的人生不輕鬆，尤其重大的節慶時分，除了日常工作，還會遇上突如其來的派對警報。要怎麼從精打細算的職業婦女，化身特級小廚娘和派對女王？你不可不知道的生存戰略包就在這。



年底，一段充滿了各種派對的日子，聖誕節、新年、各種尾牙，以及為數眾多的摩羯座朋友都在過生日（總是在工作的摩羯座站出來，年底是屬於你們的狂歡時刻）。雖然派對總是有趣，但該做的準備還是少不了，在日常與派對之間巧妙完美變身，就是職業婦女的魔法！
16:30，想起要為派對進行採買



Photo Credit: TNL MKT


沒錯，你那親愛的老公，一個月前的確是說了今天晚上要去參加主管的派對，「一個人帶一道菜」這樣聽起來超級簡單；但是身為一個每天都在開會、寫提案、交報告的職業婦女，你就是硬生生的忘記了（雙手自信叉腰）。
怎麼辦？想要做出讓眾人驚呼的「樹椿蛋糕」或「經典聖誕烤火雞」現在是絕對來不及，但是做一些用餅乾和玉米片，加上堅果就能完成的派對小食，倒是沒有問題。手錶戴起來！今天的目標是準時下班，估計六點一到就抓著購物袋和隨行杯往超市衝，應該來得及。
為什麼要帶隨行杯？畢竟是下班後去採購，肚子餓、嘴饞就要靠台灣之寶珍珠奶茶擋一下先，自備隨行杯可以折價，身為一個精打細算的職業婦女不可不留意。

這些採購裝備讓你如虎添翼


隨行杯：膳魔師吸管隨行瓶
購物袋：日本 《MARNA》 Shoupatt 輕巧秒收環保袋
手錶：Omega vintage 手上鍊機械女錶

19:00，派對小食製作中



Photo Credit: TNL MKT


原味圓餅乾擺上煙燻鮭魚和起司、法國麵包切片抹上無鹽奶油再放一片生火腿、小杯子裝生菜後，灑上油醋和一把捏碎的玉米片，十分鐘內就搞定。
但是，料理和人生一樣，愈是平淡的生活，愈要過出儀式感；而愈是簡單的食物，就愈需要用心的擺盤。
捨棄你那些用便利商店點數換來的可愛餐盤，選一塊高大上的橄欖木盤或黃銅托盤，鋪上雜貨風、北歐風，或非常點題的金紅色系聖誕風棉布；放上派對小食之後，再用小樹枝、小旗子、小堅果等裝飾點綴，質感立刻提昇87個百分點。

主婦級私廚必備道具


食譜：放鬆時光！法式餐前酒&開胃小點
餐盤：英國Naturally Med橄欖木餐板
托盤：BRASS RECTANGLE TRAY黃銅長方形托盤
裝飾小物：仿真植物、刺繡LOGO餐巾客製
食材：家樂福線上購物
生活美學養成：如何培養美感

19:30，派對前最後衝刺



Photo Credit: TNL MKT


派對小食對巧手的你來說，真的很簡單，汗都不流一滴就做好了。但是老實說，走進派對之中，沒有人在乎你的小食，或是你有沒有流汗，「氣勢」才是今晚的關鍵。尤其是聖誕派對，這裡的每一個人都會費盡心思打扮，從髮型到鞋款每一個細節都是魔鬼中的魔鬼。
首先我們處理皮膚。去洗把臉，畢竟你又是採買又是做小食的忙了一圈，與灰頭土臉的距離就在一線之間。洗好臉後面膜先敷個一輪幫助上妝。拿出電棒捲吧，一個完美無缺的髮型，絕對有助於你營造出明星級的慢動作視覺效果。忘記那些適合去開會提案的素雅淡妝，只有精緻的全妝，能讓你在派對中走路自帶BGM。
說到走路，踩上你的高跟鞋，細跟、窄楦、氣勢爆棚的那雙高跟鞋，今晚它就是你最好的朋友。腳下氣勢做這麼滿，身上穿的也不能隨意。簡約大方、剪裁有型的小洋裝平時就要備好，現在拿出來，再搭配質料上乘的喀什米爾披肩就對了。最後最後，別忘了名模必備的厭世臉，收起你平時的古道熱腸，切記，今晚不管遇到誰熱情的來打招呼，你最多只能給他一個尷尬又不失禮貌的微笑。
擔心打扮太花時間？你不要問會不會遲到，你應該問，你看過哪一個大明星早到！

派對中的大明星就是妳


面膜與其他保養品：蘭蔻雙11特惠組
化妝品：自帶光圈植村秀
高跟鞋：瞬間擁有九頭身
電棒捲：Nobby by TESCOM 日本專業沙龍修護離子電棒捲
小洋裝：黑色晚裝小禮服、紅色露肩小洋裝
喀什米爾披肩：瑞典設計師極致柔軟親膚針織圍巾披肩
尷尬又不失禮貌的微笑示意圖

23:50，派對終了今天辛苦啦



Photo Credit: TNL MKT


挽著老公，你終於回到家，又是精實、波濤洶湧、有驚無險的一天。這時候該如何犒賞自己？先倒一杯紅酒坐進沙發裡，在老公去放熱水的同時拿出手機，順手點開購物APP，畢竟你做了小食又給足老公面子，他的確應該要送你一個禮物，像你這樣的老婆實在太難得了。
太昂貴的包包沒什麼機會用，買了也是白買，跳過。
買氣炸鍋、水波爐又未免太哀怨（雖然真的非常想要一台掃拖合一機器人），但即使是職業婦女也不能老是在家電用品之間打轉，跳過。
對了，聖誕節過後就是新年假期，歐洲、美洲太遠，日本、韓國又太常去，之前聽朋友說過澳門好像很不錯，街道充滿異國風情食物又很好吃，還可以去賭場賭一把。哎唷，如果贏了大獎，明年的聖誕節就去芬蘭找聖誕老人啦呵呵呵。

老公們罩子放亮點


熱紅酒：香料包支援
沙發：北歐配色L型沙發
嘴巴上嫌貴但送了還是會開心的包包：只販售義大利精品的NOBLEDONO
掃拖合一機器人：小瓦掃地機器人規劃版
一趟犒賞老婆的旅行：澳門高端純玩三天兩夜
為明年的芬蘭行提前做功課：聖誕老人村＋北極圈一日遊

00:00，不怕，其實你還有時間



Photo Credit: TNL MKT


嘿，醒了嗎？不要讓準備參加派對的焦慮感吞噬你，嚇到做惡夢。
現在距離你老公主管要辦的聖誕派對，還有一個月。你有的是大把時間，可以趁著雙11這個購物的大好機會，精挑細選派對當天身上的行頭，把保養做足了、連手指甲也不放過。派對小食用的那些小道具就趁早備起來，當然也很推薦你把那些關於生活、關於美感的書，先買回來看熟了。有機會就抽空練練你那尷尬但不失禮貌的微笑，相信到時候就能靈活運用。
總之，只要現在做好準備，派對那天，你就會是游刃有餘的派對女王。不過話說回來，計劃永遠趕不上變化，誰知道事到臨頭的時候，你會不會只有一小時可以準備呢？
text:
Unknown professional women's party soul - Christmas party countdown 4 hours, emergency operations plan
06 Nov 2019, 06:53 by TNL Marketing


What we want you to know is that the life of a professional woman is not easy, especially during the festival, in addition to daily work, there will be unexpected party warnings. How do you get a professional woman from the budget, a special chef and a party queen? The survival strategy package you must know is here.



At the end of the year, a period full of parties, Christmas, New Year, all kinds of tails, and a large number of Capricorn friends are having a birthday (always standing in the working Capricorn, the end of the year is your carnival moment). Although the party is always fun, the preparation for this is indispensable. It is the magic of professional women in the perfect transformation between daily and party!
16:30, remembering to buy for the party



Photo Credit: TNL MKT


Yes, your dear husband, a month ago, really said that you are going to attend a party for the evening. "One person brings a dish" sounds super simple; but as a daily meeting, writing a proposal, and submitting a report The professional woman, you are forgotten and forget (both hands clasped).
How to do? It’s absolutely too late to make a “tree tree cake” or “classic Christmas roast turkey” that is exclaimed by everyone, but it’s no problem to make some party snacks with biscuits and cornflakes and nuts. Wear the watch! Today's goal is to get off work on time. It is estimated that it will be too late to grab the shopping bag and the accompanying cup to the supermarket at 6.1.
Why take the accompanying cup? After all, it is to go to work after work, hungry, mouth must rely on Taiwan's treasure pearl milk tea to block the first, self-sufficient accompanying cups can be discounted, as a budgetary professional women can not be ignored.

These purchasing equipment will make you even more powerful.


Accompanying Cup: Thermos straws accompanying bottles
Shopping bag: Japan "MARNA" Shoupatt lightweight seconds to collect bags
Watch: Omega vintage hand-wound mechanical women's watch

19:00, party snacks are being made



Photo Credit: TNL MKT


The original round biscuits are served with smoked salmon and cheese, French bread slices are smeared with salt-free cream and then a raw ham is placed, and a small cup of lettuce is sprinkled with oiled vinegar and a piece of crushed cornflakes. .
However, as with life, the more plain life, the more ritual feelings are; the simpler the food, the more it needs to be placed on the plate.
Discard your lovely plates for convenience store points, choose a tall olive wood plate or brass tray, groceries, Nordic style, or a very gold-red Christmas-style cotton cloth; put on After the party snacks, decorated with twigs, small flags, small nuts, etc., the texture immediately increased by 87 percentage points.

Housewife-level private kitchen essential props


Recipe: Relax time! French pre-dinner & appetizer
Plate: British Naturally Med Olive Wood Plate
Tray: BRASS RECTANGLE TRAY Brass Rectangular Tray
Decorative small items: artificial plants, embroidery LOGO napkins
Ingredients: Carrefour online shopping
The development of life aesthetics: how to cultivate beauty

19:30, the last sprint before the party



Photo Credit: TNL MKT


Party snacks are really simple for you, and you can do it without sweat. But to be honest, when you walk into the party, no one cares about your snacks, or if you have sweat, "embrace" is the key tonight. Especially for the Christmas party, everyone here will try their best to dress up. Every detail from hair style to shoes is the devil in the devil.
First we deal with the skin. Going to wash your face, after all, you are busy buying and making snacks, and the distance from the gray face is on the line. Wash your face and apply a round of help to apply makeup. Take out the electric bar roll, a flawless hairstyle that will definitely help you create a star-rated slow-motion visual effect. Forget the elegant and light makeup that is suitable for the meeting proposal, only the exquisite full makeup, you can walk with the BGM in the party.
Speaking of walking, stepping on your high heels, fine heels, narrow, and imposing high heels, tonight is your best friend. The momentum at the foot is so full, and the body can't be worn casually. Simple and generous, tailored small dresses are usually ready, now come out, and then paired with the finest Kashmir shawl is right. Finally, don't forget the must-have face of the supermodel, put away your usual ancient hotspot, remember, no matter who is enthusiastic to say hello tonight, you can only give him a sly and polite smile.
Worried about dressing up too much time? Don't ask if you will be late, you should ask, which big star you have seen early!

The big star in the party is 妳


Mask and other skin care products: Lancome Double 11 Special Group
Cosmetics: Bring your own aperture to the village show
High heels: instant nine-headed body
Electric Rod Roll: Nobby by TESCOM Japanese Professional Salon Repair Ion Rod Roll
Small dress: black evening dress, red strapless dress
Kashmir shawl: Swedish designer's ultimate soft skin-knit scarf shawl
尴尬 不 不 不 的 示意图 示意图 示意图

At 23:50, the party ended up working hard today.



Photo Credit: TNL MKT


Holding your husband, you finally got home, and it was a day of sturdiness, choppy, and shocking. How to reward yourself at this time? First, pour a glass of red wine into the sofa, take out the mobile phone while the husband is going to put hot water, and open the shopping app. After all, you have made a snack and give your husband a face. He really should give you a gift, like you. My wife is too rare.
Too expensive bags have no chance to use, buy is also white to buy, skip.
Buying gas fryers and water heaters is too sad (although I really want a sweeping robot), but even professional women can't always switch between home appliances and skip.
By the way, after Christmas, it is the New Year holiday. Europe and the Americas are too far away. Japan and South Korea are too frequent. Before listening to friends, it seems that Macao is very good. The streets are full of exotic food and delicious. You can also go to the casino to gamble. Put it. Hey, if you win the grand prize, go to Finland to find Santa Claus next Christmas.

Husbands cover their bright spots


Hot Wine: Spice Pack Support
Sofa: Nordic color L-shaped sofa
The bag is too expensive, but it is still a happy bag: only the NOBLEDONO of the Italian boutique
Sweeping and dragging a robot: Xiaowa sweeping robot planning version
A trip to the wife: Macau high-end pure play three days and two nights
Do your homework ahead of Finland next year: Santa Claus Village + Arctic Circle Day Tour

00:00, not afraid, actually you still have time



Photo Credit: TNL MKT


Hey, wake up? Don't let the anxiety of preparing for the party swallow you and scare you into a nightmare.
It’s still a month away from the Christmas party that your old princess is going to do. You have a lot of time, you can take advantage of the double 11 shopping opportunity, carefully selected the party on the day of the line, the maintenance is done, and even the fingernails are not let go. The small props that the party eats are prepared early. Of course, it is also recommended that you buy those books about life and beauty, and buy them back to see them. Have the opportunity to take time to practice your sly but polite smile, I believe that you can use it flexibly.
In short, as long as you are ready now, on the day of the party, you will be a party queen. But then again, the plan will never catch up with the changes. Who knows when things are coming, will you only have one hour to prepare?
